item.dc:creator: Parnifia
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

The thread has served its purpose. It has retired and is now on social-security. I believe it should be free to follow its own dreams now instead of being shoved into an old-threads home where it has nothing to do but play thread-bridge with some other lonely threads.

…If you say so…

item.source: Test Topic : please try to vote

item.title: Test Topic : please try to vote
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Parnifia:

So, would you rather have the thread actually accomplish something beyond “Does this poll work? It doesn’t? Okay, cool,” or just go nowhere and eventually die pointlessly?

The thread has served its purpose. It has retired and is now on social-security. But it is still healthy and capable of taking care of itself. I believe it should be free to follow its own dreams, hobbies, and passions now instead of being shoved into an old-threads home where it has nothing to do but play thread-bridge with some other lonely threads.

Read full topic
item.source: Test Topic : please try to vote

item.title: Test Topic : please try to vote
item.dc:creator: Parnifia
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Well, the thread was doomed to begin with. To bring it “back on track” would be trying to send it to an early grave. We’re better than that.

So, would you rather have the thread actually accomplish something beyond “Does this poll work? It doesn’t? Okay, cool,” or just go nowhere and eventually die pointlessly?

item.title: Test Topic : please try to vote
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
The only time I’ve ever ignored anyone is because they regularly posted disgusting hand-drawn pornography that made me gag every time it came across the page. I’ve gotten to the point where if I see someone’s name who never posts anything worthwhile, I just keep right on scrolling. No need to clutter up the ol’ ignore list.

Read full topic
